name: Target Mania
description:
I forgot to add this into the game's info page, you can use the mouse scroll wheel to see all of the runs in the leaderboard.

In this game you basically shoot targets (forever)

That's kinda it, more info about controls and mechanics are in the game's provided info page.

Sorry that this didn't really follow the theme, I just really wanted to make a game and submit it to the Haxe community.
